name: Werewolf Bake Sale
description:
It's a dog eat dog world out there and Angie from the PTA has said some rude things about your brownies from the last bake sale. But unlike Angie, you know a few things about community. It's time to rally yours and prove your brownies are amazing by any means necessary. 

And also make this bake sale a success probably.

A rules lite rpg playing werewolf members of the PTA  written as part of the Winter Werewolf Jam!
